name: Bill Gates
info: Co-chair of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation. Microsoft Co-founder. Voracious reader. Avid traveler. Active blogger.

activities.name: Tackling climate change is going to demand historic levels of global cooperation, unprecedented amounts of innovation in nearly every sector of the economy, widespread deployment of today’s clean-energy solutions like solar and wind, and a concerted effort to work with the people who are most vulnerable to a warmer world. It’s a complicated challenge but I believe we can avoid a climate catastrophe. Here’s how: https://lnkd.in/exYJtZG
